recommended_treatment: Adjuvant platinum-based chemotherapy and vaginal brachytherapy
description: High-grade uterine serous carcinoma confined to the endometrium (pT1a) with extensive lymphovascular space invasion; no myometrial invasion, negative pelvic and para-aortic lymph nodes; surgical margins, cervix, parametria, ovaries, and fallopian tubes are free of tumor.
patient_notes: Your results show a high-grade serous cancer limited to the inner lining of your uterus with no spread to the muscle or lymph nodes. All margins are clear, and no cancer was found in the removed lymph nodes or ovaries. Based on current guidelines for this type and stage of uterine cancer, we recommend adjuvant chemotherapy with a platinum-based regimen and localized vaginal radiation (brachytherapy) to reduce the risk of recurrence.

verification.assessment: Staging was correctly identified as FIGO IA/pT1a N0 Mx, but the histologic subtype was mischaracterized and no guideline-based adjuvant therapy was recommended. Corrections align the subtype with high-grade serous carcinoma and recommend adjuvant platinum-based chemotherapy plus vaginal brachytherapy per NCCN.

cancer_subtype.issues: Subtype incorrectly identified as endometrioid; report favors serous component.

recommended_treatment.issues: Not specified is not aligned with NCCN guidelines for high-grade uterine serous carcinoma Stage IA.

description.issues: Describes Endometrioid adenocarcinoma instead of serous histology.

patient_notes.issues: Does not mention recommended adjuvant therapy; histology mischaracterized.
